text: Three Friends and an Invention () is a 1927 Soviet silent movie directed by Aleksei Popov.Два друга, модель и подругаДВА ДРУГА, МОДЕЛЬ И ПОДРУГА It stars Sergei Lavrentyev, Aleksei Popov, and Olga Tretyakova. == Actors == * Sergei Lavrentyev as Akhov * Aleksei Popov * Olga Tretyakova as Dasha * Sergei Yablokov as Makhov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1927 movies
title: Three Friends and an Invention
